document.discussion_title: Tom Brady's Deflategate ban restored as appeals court overturns four-game suspension for New England Patriots quarterback
document.topic_text: Search Tom Brady's Deflategate ban restored as appeals court overturns four-game suspension for New England Patriots quarterback A US appeals court has restored the four-game 'Deflategate' suspension of New England Patriots star quarterback Tom Brady. Brady was originally banned over allegations footballs he used were under inflated before an NFL playoff game in 2015. And now the 2nd U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals in New York reversed a federal judge's ruling from September that had overturned the suspension, holding that NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell properly exercised his discretion. 'Our review of the record yields the firm conclusion that the Commissioner properly exercised his broad discretion to resolve an... read more
